text: this PSA must be coming from a giant headache

Hey guys I just created a sandbox account and when I make a new webpage, it won't create it with my theme or with one of HS's native themes. I've logged out of my account and logged back in, and I've restarted my browser to see if that might've been the issue but still without luck. Does anyone know what might be causing this or has anyone else ran into this in the past?

hey <@U02H4264WMB>!
this still an issue?  Are you referencing the this type of <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/set-up-a-HubSpot-sandbox-account|sandbox>?
Hey <@UD53A9UUR> Yes it's still an issue. I'm using this type of sandbox <https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>
ah.  could you send a portal id?  dm is fine if you dont want <@U3T21PDBK> to know :wink:
